similar.title: First organ donation in Wuhan after ending of the coronavirus lockdown.
text: First organ donation in Wuhan after ending of the coronavirus lockdown.

Organ donation has been suspended for almost 3 months in Wuhan due to COVID-19 outbreak. Donation and transplantation were performed on 8(th) April, the very day Wuhan lifted its lockdown. Two weeks after donation, COVID-19 screenings of the liver recipient and medical staffs present negative.
abstract: Organ donation has been suspended for almost 3 months in Wuhan due to COVID-19 outbreak. Donation and transplantation were performed on 8(th) April, the very day Wuhan lifted its lockdown. Two weeks after donation, COVID-19 screenings of the liver recipient and medical staffs present negative.
